title: No private keys, no Bitcoin: with VP at Unchained Capital Trey Sellers
description: Blockware analyst Joe Burnett speaks with Trey Sellers VP, Client Solutions from Unchained Capital to discuss the importance of holding your own Bitcoin private keys.If you liked what Trey had to say, request a consultation about moving your Bitcoin into your own hands: https://unchained.com/consultation/Follow Trey and Joe on Twitter: @ts_hodl and @IIICapital
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
